sentences.en: Both teams played with a lot of quality, pace and tempo.
sentences.cn: 两支球队的水平都很高，节奏和速度都很快。

sentences.en: Buying budget-priced furniture needn't mean compromising on quality or style.
sentences.cn: 买价钱经济的家具并不意味着就要牺牲质量和样式。

sentences.en: Compact discs have brought about a vast improvement in recorded sound quality.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片极大地提高了录音的音质。

sentences.en: Even the quality papers agreed that it was a triumph.
sentences.cn: 即使是内容严肃的报纸也认为这是一次胜利。

sentences.en: He is a firm believer in total quality management.
sentences.cn: 他是个极力主张全面质量管理的人。

sentences.en: Her colourful oils and works on paper have a naive, dreamlike quality.
sentences.cn: 她那些色彩斑斓的油画与纸上作品给人一种天真、梦幻般的感觉。

sentences.en: In some works, flowers take on a powerful emblematic quality.
sentences.cn: 在一些作品中，花具有强烈的象征意义。

sentences.en: Little of the existing housing is of good enough quality.
sentences.cn: 现有的住房几乎少有质量过关的。

sentences.en: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.cn: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.en: quality childcare at prices people can afford
sentences.cn: 人们负担得起的优质儿童护育服务

sentences.en: quality double glazing
sentences.cn: 优质的双层玻璃

sentences.en: Relentless in his pursuit of quality, his technical ability was remarkable.
sentences.cn: 对质量孜孜不倦的追求使他的技能出类拔萃。

sentences.en: The college has few ways to assess the quality of education overall.
sentences.cn: 总体看来,这所大学评估教育质量的方法寥寥无几.

sentences.en: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.cn: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

sentences.en: The shoes were of good design and good quality.
sentences.cn: 这些鞋样式新颖，质量上乘。

sentences.en: Today's organic wine producer is typically a small, quality-conscious family concern.
sentences.cn: 现今的有机葡萄酒生产商一般是注重品质的小型家族企业.

sentences.en: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.cn: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.en: We have been successful because we are offering a quality service.
sentences.cn: 我们因提供的服务水准一流一直经营得很成功。

sentences.en: We occupy a quality position in the market place.
sentences.cn: 我们在市场上居于高端地位。

sentences.en: When selecting boots, fine, quality leather will be a wise investment.
sentences.cn: 在挑选长筒靴的时候，购买上等的好皮靴将是明智的选择。

phrases.tran_cn: 良好品质，高品质；好质量
生活质量；基本生活条件
表面质量；表面符号；外观要求

trans.tran_cn: 优质的，棒极了，内容严肃的（报纸）
trans.tran_en: very good – used especially by people who are trying to sell something
how good or bad something is
